title: Silent Hill 3: The Movie 720P MP4 (Game Edit)
description:
Silent Hill 3: The Movie by Fungo
~An edit of the Silent Hill 3 video game in theatrical form~  
http://www.silenthillmedia.net for more info

-----Information-----

FIRST OF ALL, if you're concerned about filesize, it's because of the quality bitrate and sound. Another contributing factor to the size of this torrent has to do with the extremely large bonus [deleted or remastered cutscene] video clips I added for your enjoyment.

This is an artistically edited, feature-length movie of the 2003 video-game Silent Hill 3 in full 720p High Definition. And no, it's not just some let's player dicking around and calling it a movie.

Run time is approximately 121 minutes and 30 seconds, but there's 30 minutes of cut clips (trimmed for time) and a few remastered scenes from the game included! It is in 16:9 aspect ratio (widescreen) and is in 720p High Definition. It's is in MP4 format. When I recorded the footage, I had a slower PC, so there are times the frame-rate will drop in the movie. It has a wealth of subtitles including English, Greek, Polish, Brazilian Portuguese, and Spanish subtitles.

-----STORY-----

Heather, an average girl shopping at the mall, gets pulled into a nightmare filled with monsters. She later discovers there are dark secrets between her and the mysterious town of Silent Hill, then ventures forth for answers.

-----CREDITS-----

All the credit goes to Team Silent and Konami for publishing this game. I would also like to thank specifically Hiroyuki Owaku for the incredible storyline, Masahiro Ito  for the disturbing creatures and design, Akira Yamaoka for his production and for bringing the games to life with his memorable music, Jeremy Blaustein for his incredible localization in the puzzles and story, and the rest of the staff for making it all happen.

Thanks to all the fans that love and support my SH2 movie. It's because of you that I made a SH3 movie.
